tool_description:
A reliable API to search & scrape LinkedIn jobs, profiles (all profile details, skills, work experience, **open to work** status, course, education, given & received recommendation), last activity date, and companies. %100 live data, no dead data!

**For any questions or requests, please feel free to leave a message in the Discussions or PM channels.**

**Please contact us if you need a custom package**

for high limits, you can take a look https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/l...
name: Linkedin API
title: Linkedin API

api_list.name: Get Company Insights [PREMIUM] (BETA)
api_list.description:
Get Company Insight Details & Company Details in a single requst. **5 credit per call.** If the request fails, you don't pay.
Automate LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
This endpoint is beta. If you are faced with an issue, please contact us.

api_list.name: Search Jobs V2
api_list.description: Search Jobs

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; 0, 50, 100, 150, 200, etc.

optional_parameters.name: salary
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these; 40k+, 60k+, 80k+, 100k+, 120k+, 140k+, 160k+, 180k+, 200k+
Example: 80k+

optional_parameters.name: locationId
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/linkedin-api8/tutorials/how-to-find-a-location-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find location id

optional_parameters.name: jobType
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these; fullTime, partTime, contract, internship
Example: contract

optional_parameters.name: companyIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/linkedin-api8/tutorials/how-to-find-a-company-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find company id

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; mostRelevant, mostRecent

optional_parameters.name: experienceLevel
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these; internship, associate, director, entryLevel, midSeniorLevel. executive
example: executive

optional_parameters.name: onsiteRemote
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these;
- onSite
- remote
- hybrid

example: remote

optional_parameters.name: functionIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/linkedin-api8/tutorials/how-to-find-a-function-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find function id

optional_parameters.name: titleIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/linkedin-api8/tutorials/how-to-find-a-title-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find title id by title

optional_parameters.name: datePosted
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; anyTime, pastMonth, pastWeek, past24Hours

optional_parameters.name: industryIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/linkedin-api8/tutorials/how-to-find-a-industry-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find industry id

api_list.name: Get Profile Data
api_list.description: Get all profile data, including experience,  skills, language and companies, **open to work** status, hiring status, location. Check **Example Responses** for more details

api_list.name: Get Profile Post and Comments
api_list.description: Get profile post and comments of the post

required_parameters.name: urn
required_parameters.description:
URN value of the post.
Example URL: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/andy-jassy-8b1615_amazon-bedrock-customers-have-more-choice-activity-7181285160586211328-Idxl/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop
Example URN: 7181285160586211328

api_list.name: Search Employees
api_list.description:
Get employees of company. 50 result per page
**10 credits per call**

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, etc.

api_list.name: Get Profile Post Comment
api_list.description: Get 50 comments of a profile post

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: it could be one of these; mostRelevant, mostRecent

api_list.name: Get Profile's Posts
api_list.description: Get last 50 posts of a profile. 1 credit per call

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: use this param to get posts in next results page: 0 for page 1, 50 for page 2 100 for page 3, etc.

optional_parameters.name: paginationToken
optional_parameters.description: It is required when fetching the next results page. The token from the previous call must be used.
